data.what_is: Total Expert is the purpose-built customer engagement platform trusted by more than 200 financial enterprises. The platform unifies data, marketing, sales, and compliance solutions to deliver the perfect customer journey across every financial milestone, in any market. Total Expert turns customer insights into actions to increase loyalty and drive growth for banks, lenders, credit unions, and insurance companies, and is now available to purchase through the AWS Marketplace and Salesforce AppExchange.
data.product_description: Automate, deploy and track your marketing activities from the top down and simplify your daily process for producing print and digital marketing assets.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 45 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 44 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: Based on 36 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 44 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 40 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 46 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Based on 28 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Based on 30 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 44 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Based on 33 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 64 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Based on 59 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 61 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 57 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Based on 49 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Based on 54 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Based on 44 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 49 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords. 36 reviewers of Total Expert have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: Based on 50 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Based on 48 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 45 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Based on 39 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 48 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: As reported in 35 Total Expert reviews. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 47 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Based on 47 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Based on 45 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Based on 41 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Based on 33 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Based on 31 Total Expert reviews. Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores. 32 reviewers of Total Expert have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Based on 49 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Based on 38 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails. 39 reviewers of Total Expert have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Based on 32 Total Expert reviews. Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 57 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Based on 42 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 38 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Based on 35 Total Expert reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.content: As reported in 34 Total Expert reviews. Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

initial_reviews.review_title: The platform is unusable and unreliable; technical support...terrible - UPDATE 1/19/24: - Progress
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
We have one individual on the TAM team who is wonderful. She meets with us regularly, is highly knowledgeable, and is extremely reliable. She is by far one of the best support specialists I have ever worked with. However, she receives no support from her product development or technical support teams.

UPDATE 1/19/24: While implementation took more than a year, we are now up and running, and Total Expert's Management and Executive teams appear to be listening and working diligently to ensure the system is running smoothly and effectively. I'm able to meet with the same TAM specialists on a regular basis and she continues to be a tremendous help in ensuring our journeys are running as they should while helping us create new journeys. These journeys are proving to be a big help to both our operations and retail teams in automating customer communications. Total Expert also gives our marketing team access to data that we typically had to request from our Data team, which now frees up a lot of their time as well. We are finally beginning to see the benefits of automated communications, as the platform is finally working as it should.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
The entire system is essentially broken. We pulled a customer list today and compared it to a list pulled from our core and the data did not match up at all. When the TAM specialist and I originally discovered the issue and notified the technical support team, we received numerous emails stating that the issue was fixed. But it never was. Today, the tech support person actually acknowledged that there is an issue, but I'm not confident they will follow up or have the issue resolved any time soon. This is just one example of a myriad of issues we've experienced. The amount of time that I have wasted and the amount of resources our bank has dumped into this platform makes me sick to my stomach. It's been nearly two years, and the platform is completely unreliable and essentially broken. The amount of time that I have invested is sickening. It's embarrassing and makes myself and my entire department look bad.

UPDATE 1/19/24: Because of the myriad of past issues, developing trust and confidence in the system has been difficult. Our operations, retail, and marketing teams are still leery of the system, but since we've been up and running, there have only been a couple of minor issues that Total Expert has since addressed. We're still unsure of how the Total Expert Management/Executive teams plan to address the previous issues with implementation and technical errors and how they plan to "make the situation right," but we hope to have a resolution soon.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is creating additional problems for me. Because the platform is broken and unreliable, and I'm constantly spending time trying to fix it, it serves as no benefit for me.

UPDATE 1/19/24: The system is proving to be a big time-saver in automating customer communications. We're able to automate overdraft communications that now save our Operations team 1-2 hours a day in manual customer outreach, Dormant account journeys that save our retail staff time in customer outreach, and onboarding journeys that automate retail communications to new account holders. In addition, it allows our marketing teams to pull customer data that we typically needed our Data teams to pull, saving them a great deal of time as well.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
The team at Total Expert is built on a wide breadth of experts on everything from analytics to automation and even support. I appreciate their ability to not only provide me with what they believe is the best path but are also interested in listening to ideas that could enhance their processes and products as well.

I can't shout out to the world enough about how creating a UI that is easy to use for the end user and Total Expert does it regularly!

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
I believe that Total Expert is a good business partner, but to become a great partner there needs to be more ebb and flow to what the platform is capable of doing versus what it could become.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
Follow up, follow up, follow up...

Why do loan officers lose deals? Because they are too busy to forget about their pipeline. Total Expert makes it easy to be top of mind constantly!

initial_reviews.review_title: Bringing CRMs into the digital age
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
I like best some of the logic that can be used for Journey building and some of the integrations that are offered to increase automation or pair down technology like Experience.com, Homebot, BombBomb, nCinco, Customer Intelligence, and more! Total Expert has continually shown they're making strong efforts to meet clients where they need to be when almost everything happens digitally. We work with DBAs and Total Expert makes that process easy for onboarding. I like how reachable and helpful different departments are in hearing what's happening and helping us reach a solution. Total Expert leadership makes us feel heard and important! Ben Carlson is also a great Account Executive who advocates for us! It's a huge benefit that Total Expert has Bobbi Jo Dallas focused on engagement in the system and it's tools.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
I dislike the lack of the admin capabilities where access to view contacts or data related to those contacts and numbers surrounding them isn't possible from the admin account in TE. It's a downside that the system's UX doesn't always follow an LO's train of thought so it can lead to confusion on where to go for what and can affect their engagement level. I dislike that most things are an add-on cost that means we're asking for more money throughout a contract period on a regular basis vs having them tied in to the cost of the accounts.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
Total Expert is solving pairing down tech when it makes sense so that an LO doesn't need to log into or contact multiple people to get the support or data they need on their database. It's helping an LO mine their database for what makes sense for them through focus views, emails, print media, Customer Intelligence, tasks, texting, and more. This allows our team to create more cohesive marketing in a place where our LOs don't have to learn multiple systems and save time by leveraging a lot of automation that talks to one another within the platform. It's allowing our LOs to get in front of the prospects they need to!

initial_reviews.review_title: Total Expert is easy to use and offers great marketing tools
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
Total Expert offers great marketing tools that make sending emails, tracking open rates, and offering social media options to our loans officers easy. We use Campaign Builder a lot and like the capabilities that journeys offer as well. The also offer great customer support through a CSM as well as tech support online.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
We find the least helpful feature has been the print marketing materials. The printing options provided have not been, in the past, the best value for our team. We can print items much cheaper by using our local printers.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
I don't use Total Expert to solve a lot of business problems.  I use it primarily as a marketing tool that I manage and implement for our loan officers.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
I love all of the features packed into one system. For my LOs, using one login to access their CRM, flyers, social media posts, tasks and activities, Realtor and co-marketing tools, text messaging, video messaging, and their dashboard is a top-selling point. While most, importantly using automation so they can focus on strictly the activities that require their efforts and actions is what sets Total Expert apart. From the administrator's perspective, the system is user-friendly, and the level of support we receive is second to none. We are kept in the loop of new features and given the tools to succeed from launch onward.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
We struggle with some of the lack of features tied specifically to our LOS. Populating pricing from our pricing engine is a struggle. We would love to pay additional attention to things like open house flyers and further integrations with additional text tools and recruiting related resources.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are solving the problem of limited time and limited output capabilities of our Loan Officers. Total Expert helps elevate the client experience by offering consistency and transparency in our process with a personalized path. My Loan Officers sleep better knowing that they have a personal assistant working behind the scenes to ensure they look good. They can then focus on the more personal outward touch points such as co-marketing and social media.

all_reviews.review_title: The platform is unusable and unreliable; technical support...terrible - UPDATE 1/19/24: - Progress
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
We have one individual on the TAM team who is wonderful. She meets with us regularly, is highly knowledgeable, and is extremely reliable. She is by far one of the best support specialists I have ever worked with. However, she receives no support from her product development or technical support teams.

UPDATE 1/19/24: While implementation took more than a year, we are now up and running, and Total Expert's Management and Executive teams appear to be listening and working diligently to ensure the system is running smoothly and effectively. I'm able to meet with the same TAM specialists on a regular basis and she continues to be a tremendous help in ensuring our journeys are running as they should while helping us create new journeys. These journeys are proving to be a big help to both our operations and retail teams in automating customer communications. Total Expert also gives our marketing team access to data that we typically had to request from our Data team, which now frees up a lot of their time as well. We are finally beginning to see the benefits of automated communications, as the platform is finally working as it should.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
The entire system is essentially broken. We pulled a customer list today and compared it to a list pulled from our core and the data did not match up at all. When the TAM specialist and I originally discovered the issue and notified the technical support team, we received numerous emails stating that the issue was fixed. But it never was. Today, the tech support person actually acknowledged that there is an issue, but I'm not confident they will follow up or have the issue resolved any time soon. This is just one example of a myriad of issues we've experienced. The amount of time that I have wasted and the amount of resources our bank has dumped into this platform makes me sick to my stomach. It's been nearly two years, and the platform is completely unreliable and essentially broken. The amount of time that I have invested is sickening. It's embarrassing and makes myself and my entire department look bad.

UPDATE 1/19/24: Because of the myriad of past issues, developing trust and confidence in the system has been difficult. Our operations, retail, and marketing teams are still leery of the system, but since we've been up and running, there have only been a couple of minor issues that Total Expert has since addressed. We're still unsure of how the Total Expert Management/Executive teams plan to address the previous issues with implementation and technical errors and how they plan to "make the situation right," but we hope to have a resolution soon.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is creating additional problems for me. Because the platform is broken and unreliable, and I'm constantly spending time trying to fix it, it serves as no benefit for me.

UPDATE 1/19/24: The system is proving to be a big time-saver in automating customer communications. We're able to automate overdraft communications that now save our Operations team 1-2 hours a day in manual customer outreach, Dormant account journeys that save our retail staff time in customer outreach, and onboarding journeys that automate retail communications to new account holders. In addition, it allows our marketing teams to pull customer data that we typically needed our Data teams to pull, saving them a great deal of time as well.

This is just one example of a myriad of issues we've experienced. The amount of time that I have wasted and the amount of resources our bank has dumped into this platform makes me sick to my stomach. It's been nearly two years, and the platform is completely unreliable and essentially broken. The amount of time that I have invested is sickening. It's embarrassing and makes myself and my entire department look bad.

UPDATE 1/19/24: Because of the myriad of past issues, developing trust and confidence in the system has been difficult. Our operations, retail, and marketing teams are still leery of the system, but since we've been up and running, there have only been a couple of minor issues that Total Expert has since addressed. We're still unsure of how the Total Expert Management/Executive teams plan to address the previous issues with implementation and technical errors and how they plan to "make the situation right," but we hope to have a resolution soon.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
It is creating additional problems for me. Because the platform is broken and unreliable, and I'm constantly spending time trying to fix it, it serves as no benefit for me.

UPDATE 1/19/24: The system is proving to be a big time-saver in automating customer communications. We're able to automate overdraft communications that now save our Operations team 1-2 hours a day in manual customer outreach, Dormant account journeys that save our retail staff time in customer outreach, and onboarding journeys that automate retail communications to new account holders. In addition, it allows our marketing teams to pull customer data that we typically needed our Data teams to pull, saving them a great deal of time as well.

all_reviews.review_title: Bringing CRMs into the digital age
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
I like best some of the logic that can be used for Journey building and some of the integrations that are offered to increase automation or pair down technology like Experience.com, Homebot, BombBomb, nCinco, Customer Intelligence, and more! Total Expert has continually shown they're making strong efforts to meet clients where they need to be when almost everything happens digitally. We work with DBAs and Total Expert makes that process easy for onboarding. I like how reachable and helpful different departments are in hearing what's happening and helping us reach a solution. Total Expert leadership makes us feel heard and important! Ben Carlson is also a great Account Executive who advocates for us! It's a huge benefit that Total Expert has Bobbi Jo Dallas focused on engagement in the system and it's tools.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
I dislike the lack of the admin capabilities where access to view contacts or data related to those contacts and numbers surrounding them isn't possible from the admin account in TE. It's a downside that the system's UX doesn't always follow an LO's train of thought so it can lead to confusion on where to go for what and can affect their engagement level. I dislike that most things are an add-on cost that means we're asking for more money throughout a contract period on a regular basis vs having them tied in to the cost of the accounts.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
Total Expert is solving pairing down tech when it makes sense so that an LO doesn't need to log into or contact multiple people to get the support or data they need on their database. It's helping an LO mine their database for what makes sense for them through focus views, emails, print media, Customer Intelligence, tasks, texting, and more. This allows our team to create more cohesive marketing in a place where our LOs don't have to learn multiple systems and save time by leveraging a lot of automation that talks to one another within the platform. It's allowing our LOs to get in front of the prospects they need to!

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
I love all of the features packed into one system. For my LOs, using one login to access their CRM, flyers, social media posts, tasks and activities, Realtor and co-marketing tools, text messaging, video messaging, and their dashboard is a top-selling point. While most, importantly using automation so they can focus on strictly the activities that require their efforts and actions is what sets Total Expert apart. From the administrator's perspective, the system is user-friendly, and the level of support we receive is second to none. We are kept in the loop of new features and given the tools to succeed from launch onward.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
We struggle with some of the lack of features tied specifically to our LOS. Populating pricing from our pricing engine is a struggle. We would love to pay additional attention to things like open house flyers and further integrations with additional text tools and recruiting related resources.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are solving the problem of limited time and limited output capabilities of our Loan Officers. Total Expert helps elevate the client experience by offering consistency and transparency in our process with a personalized path. My Loan Officers sleep better knowing that they have a personal assistant working behind the scenes to ensure they look good. They can then focus on the more personal outward touch points such as co-marketing and social media.

all_reviews.review_content:

Dealing with primarily content, the support and turn-around time we get on any issues that arise is typically very quick and helpful. Templates are easy to share and edit. They are also constantly pushing new updates to add new features and optimize current content.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
The new email builder is missing some core elements that we need. We cannot lock snippets/code-blocks, which would be helpful for things like signatures and disclaimers. We would also like to see some ways to limit the colors that users can use in the builder (we'd like them to be limited to brand colors).

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are constantly pushing the limits of what's possible with Total Expert and so far we have streamlined our process of adding new content and getting that content to our users. We are currently reworking how things are cataloged using Total Expert's folder and tag system.

all_reviews.review_title: Total Expert's team is quick and efficient. The product is high quality.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
The platform is user-friendly and easy to navigate. The co-marketing functions are a huge benefit as many Realtors are in awe of the single property sites and listing flyers. The focussed view and the customization of the focussed view, being able to assign to specific teams, etc. is a great benefit.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
Receiving conflicting messages from different TE team members.  We would like to customize our dashboard and we were originally told it required a SOW then 6 months later we were told there were available dashboard configurations at no cost. Anything beyond the available configurations would require a SOW. In September 2021 we were told automated postcards were available, we advertised this to our LO's and had them opt-in, only to find out this function was not ready and would not be ready until June 2022. These are just two instances of many.

The Optimal Blue integration pulls in incorrect rates from OB. OB points the finger at TE and TE points the finger at OB. The customer is left without a solution.

It would be great if the Loan Pipeline could have a "saved" view like the contacts list.

The dialer does not have a transfer function.

Listing insights are inaccurate.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
Being able to pull custom reports would be beneficial. We currently have to submit a special request that takes 5-7 business days to receive. Enhanced reporting that we can pull ourselves would be a huge advancement and we are told it may be rolled out by Jan 2023.

all_reviews.review_title: I will forever be their #1 fan
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
The ability to customize everything. We can make so much that is company-specific, which allows us to keep everything on brand.  At the same time we can utilize their custom content and customize that as well. We never run out of options.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
NOTHING! There is nothing that I dislike, maybe the cost, but when you see what Total Expert can do you understand the cost and it is completely justified! There is nothing this CRM can't do! And they are adding more every day! I actually get excited about the releases.

Recommendations to others considering Total Expert:
You won't be sorry if by going with Total Expert. This CRM blows everyone else away. There is no comparison. We had to have 2 CRMs before to do HALF of what Total Expert can do.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
I can customize things for every LO in my company and make things single-person-specific if I want. Total Expert has also made it so much easier to stay in front of our customers and keep our finger on the pulse of what our customers want and need. Their custom reports help us see and understand each customer we contact.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
I like the large amounts of engagement resources available to Admins and the support that we have available to us. Other CRM platforms that I've worked with are not as helpful in this aspect or charge loads extra for it.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
System UI and UX can be a bit overwhelming for end users that aren't "techy" or experienced in using CRM's - not an issue with proper training.

Personally, I'd like to see improvements in Single Property Sites. They should be dynamic enough to update on their own based on status in MLS (active, pending, sold, etc. ).

The inability to make custom forms and landing pages within TE is a bit disappointing and a product gap when compared to other CRMs. This gap can be filled through integrations with other platforms, but that is not ideal.

This may be possible and I don't know how but I don't believe there is any way to download a PDF "handbook" of a journey. In other CRMs, you can download an entire workflow/campaign in a visually appealing PDF handbook that helps you better visualize the campaign and what goes out and when.

Recommendations to others considering Total Expert:
Get a dedicated person or even a team at your company that manages your CRM. You will see much better utilization and ROI if you do so.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are focusing on lead follow-up automation through various journeys and lead capture apps. TE has enabled to have consistent automated touch-points that keep our originators top of mind without them having to dedicate a significant amount of time to it.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
It feels like Total Expert is not an out-of-the-box product, but more configurable to our needs. This can be a blessing and headache at times, but it feels like they are working to make more integrations and configurations available to the user as needed. Total Expert allows for journey builds that are useful for reaching our prospects in a very timely/circumstantial case-by-case scenario helping us reach better segmented audiences. It's nice to have a lot of support channels available.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
The interface feels clunky or rushed to market. Things get held up/frozen/lost from time to time causing work to take longer than any other CRM I've used in any industry. Emails almost never save correctly causing us to work harder to figure out workarounds than actually working on figuring out content/strategy from within.

Recommendations to others considering Total Expert:
Have CRM experience with other companies. It will be very hard to build this from the ground up without any experience in CRM builds as you're made to do most of it yourself by way of guidance calls.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's buggy from time to time. There's not always concrete answers from the support team. A lot of "we'll have to get back to you" type of answers causing a lot of frustration from our top down. We have been using Total Expert from a retail and wholesale mortgage perspective and it seems like there are a lot of things TE COULD do, but we get lost in the bugs more often than not.

all_reviews.review_title: Total Expert makes marketing and contact management approachable and doable for sales teams.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
Total Expert (TE) is the optimal platform for marketing material and contact management. In an industry where every salesperson is a manager of their own business, TE delivers marketing teams of financial organizations the ability to easily manage and create marketing assets and a database management tool. The UX is overall very good and provides all the basic tools for a salesperson to manage and market to their database. Integrations such as Facebook, BombBomb, Mortgage Coach, MBS Highway, and more makes it easy to centralize all the marketing tools our teams are using.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
TE is a great tool for beginner to moderate users. For advanced CRM users, there are some pretty big gaps in terms of contact organization, reporting, and supporting non-retail mortgage teams. The lack of a "shark tank" makes organization-level lead management difficult and account improvements (such as creating new marketing templates, lead app templates, advanced reporting) are somewhat prohibitive to create due to cost. TE checks 8/10 boxes though and is an amazing tool.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
TE helps us to offer a robust marketing asset collection to our retail sales team and provides integrations with necessary sales platforms like our LOS and POS.

all_reviews.review_title: Total Expert the ideal marketing platform for financial services.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
Total Expert is an innovative marketing platform born to help drive the growth of financial services. One aspect that distinguishes Total Expert is that it is a perfect tool to help companies humanize customer relationships. With this platform, it is very easy to implement marketing strategies according to the needs required to ensure the success of users. The platform provides a large amount of resources that are perfect for managing the brand at an enterprise level, obtaining greater supervision, ensuring compliance with audits, which provides a clear vision for better decision making.

The service stands out for being web-based, it has very useful functions that allow from managing calendars, contacts, listings, websites, commissions, advertising emails among others. Its usability is very simple, since the interface has a very simple structure that allows users to work at all times with great agility to achieve their goals.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
Your ability to make customization's can become quite limiting, as the software has very few customization options. This is really an aspect that I would like developers to take into account when executing improvements to Total Expert. One disadvantage of this service is that it is currently very difficult to obtain support support, as it is a rather slow running computer.

Recommendations to others considering Total Expert:
Total Expert is a very optimal marketing tool to implement in any company or finance business, the service provides very good resources to boost the growth of your company, improve customer relationships and increase income, I recommend the service because it is very easy to implement, use and its operation is highly stable.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
In our financial company, Total Expert is a tool that has allowed us to greatly boost our marketing, enabling us to build customer relationships, increase revenue streams and drive growth for our brands. The service has really been very timely for our marketing team, as it has allowed us to tackle great challenges, we have been able to obtain practically instantaneous improvements and we can say that the service is very profitable for our business.

all_reviews.review_title: Total Expert has been a game changer for our business
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Total Expert?
While the technology and UX of the CRM system come second to none, the best part of working with Total Expert is their service. Training, communication and tutorials are extensive and always readily available, keeping our admin and coordinator teams out of the weeds and day-to-day inquiries. Due to their strong financial backing and promising future, developmental updates and improvements are made regularly, keeping their customers' needs at the forefront of process and technology improvements. With competitive tools to help grow and scale business for our sales field, this system has become a morale booster and game changer for our business.

What do you dislike about Total Expert?
Being a new system, certain features have yet to reach full maturity; however, constant improvements and updates are being made regularly. The system and team behind it are working hard to make sure customers are happy and though there are certain features that are still pending release, I'm confident Total Expert will get there.

Recommendations to others considering Total Expert:
Make sure you document each conversation and keep them filed in an organized fashion. With lots of communication and months of implementation, you will need a strong, dedicated number of admins assisting with the rollout. Ongoing training schedules for your sales field will be critical to your organization's success with adopting this tool.

What problems is Total Expert solving and how is that benefiting you?
Scalability, adoption of new digital tools and deepening ties with our referral partners thanks to the features our field is able to offer them.
